About Me

Introduction

BIO

I am a young I.T. practitioner with experience and expertise in different roles such as administrative, data entry/processing, IT and technical assistant, with a broad understanding of computer software and hardware, organized and responsible, able to work effectively on own initiative if necessary. Experienced web developer and data scientist, specializing in backend development, competent with all stages of development cycle for dynamic web projects. Well-versed in numerous programming languages including python, sql, php, html and css, javascript. Good background in project management and customer relations.

Over the last few years, I have honed my technical skills by working on a range of projects, both working individually and with teams. Since I started working as an IT practitional, I have pursed every opportunity to learn and develop my skills.


Skills

  • Familiarity with operating systems (e.g., Linux, Windows) and knowledge of system administration tasks.
  • Competent in building and styling web pages using python, php, html and css
  • Capable of utilising programming languages such as Python & SQL for data manipulation and query optimization.
  • Experience of scripting languages (e.g., Python, Bash) for automation and task simplification.
  • Basic understanding of networking concepts, protocols, and security (e.g., TCP/IP, VPN, firewalls).
  • Good understanding of data requirements for digital capability.
  • Familiar with a range of Adobe Creative for graphic and print design.
  • Familiar with a range of common double entry bookkeeping applications
  • Good understanding of IT infrastructure components, including servers, networks, and storage.
